column4: Hi...How can I search and install my video drivers in terminal ?
<ikonia> : I dont know...How can I know it ?
, qin : Thanks a lot...that was what I was searching for.. :)
: And what if I want to unmount it ?
ThinkT510 qin : When I try to unmount , it says device is busy...I am not at all using it..what to do ?
Its because the device is well busy
Some background process is using it
Try cd'ing out of the directory
ThinkT510 qin : Thanks  :) ..Will trouble you again if I struck somewhere :P
Boot in recovery, mode select resume normal boot, then on shutdown see the error message shown
: OK will tell u in some time...I need to logout for that so leaving...
